discovery_rule.name: HP hardware fans discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of hardware fans as defined in global regular expression "HP Hardware Fans for discovery".

item_prototype.name: Relative speed for fan {#FANSLOT}

discovery_rule.name: HP hardware Power discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of hardware power supply as defined in global regular expression "HP Hardware Power for discovery".

item_prototype.name: Power supply {#POWERID} consumption
Power supply {#POWERID} status

discovery_rule.name: HP hardware raid controller discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of hardware raid controller as defined in global regular expression "HP Hardware Raid controller for discovery".

item_prototype.name: Battery/Capacitor status for controller {#CONTROLLERID}
Cache Module available size for controller {#CONTROLLERID}
Cache Module read ratio for controller {#CONTROLLERID}
Cache Module write ratio for controller {#CONTROLLERID}

discovery_rule.name: HP hardware raid logical drive discovery

condition.value: @HP Hardware Raid logical drive for discovery

discovery_rule.description: Discovery of hardware raid logical drive as defined in global regular expression "HP Hardware Raid logical drive for discovery".

discovery_rule.name: HP hardware raid physical drive discovery

condition.value: @HP Hardware Raid physical drive for discovery

discovery_rule.description: Discovery of hardware raid physical drive as defined in global regular expression "HP Hardware Raid physical drive for discovery".

item_prototype.name: Physical drive {#PHYSICALDRIVESLOT} on controler {#CONTROLLERSLOT} status

discovery_rule.name: HP hardware temperature sensor discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of hardware temperature sensor as defined in global regular expression "HP Hardware Temperature for discovery".

trigger.name: HP IML too many hpasmcli processes
